content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 9, Granada CF 1.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 9, Granada CF 1.

Foul by Daniel Candeias (Granada CF).
Goal!  Real Madrid 9, Granada CF 1. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Luka Modric with a cross following a set piece situation.
